CHRISTMAS IN JULY!!!!            ïŠïŠïŠïŠïŠïŠïŠïŠïŠ           WIN WIN WIN

Every week in July YOU could win amazing prizes! Every approved Bridging Finance application increases your chances of winning. Winners will have the opportunity to pick a number and win a single or double prize each Friday.

Prizes:

Week 1: 24pcs Pearl Cutlery Set or Largo Red Wine Glasses
Week 2: DKNY Golden Delicious EDP or DKNY for Men EDT
Week 3: Country Road Gusset Detail Tote Bag or Bree Bonded Tote Bag
Week 4: Mimco Large Turnlock Wallet or Safarium Mim Wallet

But wait, thereâ€™s more! SPOT PRIZES of R250 Woolworths vouchers will be randomly drawn every week for whoever submits an application.

GRAND PRIZE of a R3000 Le Creuset Hamper will be won by the person who submits the most applications during the month!
